summary: This is a brief email exchange from March 2021 regarding the confirmation and pulling of evidence spreadsheets pertaining to the Epstein investigation. It references attached evidence lists and thanks for assistance.

persons.name: Byrne
persons.context: Person who sent an email on March 16, 2021, with attached evidence spreadsheets related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Evidence Spreadsheets Sent
events.description: Byrne sends an email with attached evidence spreadsheets pertaining to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Confirmation Request for Evidence Pull
events.description: An email is sent to confirm the request to pull all evidence and states that the process will start that day.

keyFacts: As of March 2021, evidence spreadsheets related to the Epstein investigation were being actively managed and pulled.
The email exchange indicates ongoing investigative activity regarding evidence collection years after Epstein's death.
The correspondence is external, marked as '[EXTERNAL EMAIL]', suggesting communication between different organizations or entities.
